info.title: Brackets
info.description: The Toornament platform connects your website and application with the eSports tournaments around the world.

get.description: Returns all bracket nodes. A bracket node represents a match and some extra data.

scopes.organizer:result: Grants the ability to edit information and referee results.
Grants the ability to edit information and referee results.

nodesRange.name: Range
nodesRange.description: A range of requested items using the 'nodes' unit. The size of the range can not exceed 128. (see [Pagination](https://developer.toornament.com/v2/overview/pagination))

tournamentIds.name: tournament_ids
tournamentIds.description: A list of tournament ids to filter.

stageIds.name: stage_ids
stageIds.description: A list of stage ids to filter.

stageNumbers.name: stage_numbers
stageNumbers.description: A list of stage numbers to filter.

groupIds.name: group_ids
groupIds.description: A list of group ids to filter.

groupNumbers.name: group_numbers
groupNumbers.description: A list of group numbers to filter.

roundIds.name: round_ids
roundIds.description: A list of round ids to filter.

roundNumbers.name: round_numbers
roundNumbers.description: A list of round numbers to filter.

id.description: The id of the bracket node and the match (they both share the same id).

tournament_id.description: The id of the tournament that contains this bracket node.

stage_id.description: The id of the stage that contains this bracket node.

group_id.description: The id of the group that contains this bracket node.

round_id.description: The id of the round that contains this bracket node.

number.description: The match number (a relative identifier within a round).

scheduled_datetime.description: The scheduled date of the match in RFC 3339 (combined date, time and utc offset).

played_at.description: The timestamp on which the match was played (a result was provided) in RFC 3339 (combined date, time and utc offset).

depth.description: The depth of the node in the bracket.

branch.description: The core branch of the node in the bracket.

number.description: A relative identifier between 1 and the total number of participants, it is unique and determined by the seeding.

position.description: The opponent position (calculate by internal processes).

rank.description: The rank of the participant in the ranking. Multiple participants can share the same rank if they are tied after applying all configured tiebreakers.

source_type.description: The type of source of this node item.

source_node_id.description: The id of the bracket node connected to this opponent.

allOf.description: The participant identified with this opponent.

custom_user_identifier.description: An external custom user identifier. Use the format that suits your needs.

custom_fields.description: The values of the custom fields configured in the tournament using the machine names as keys. For more information, please read the [Custom Fields](https://developer.toornament.com/v2/core-concepts/custom-fields) documentation.
